about.description:
Regents Park is a luxury high-rise lakefront apartment community conveniently located in Hyde Park and just minutes from all the culture, entertainment, and dining options that make Chicago so unique. Regents Park apartments in Hyde Park include a swimming pool, 24/7 concierge and maintenance services, a state-of-the-art fitness facility, a private park, and a gourmet market. Studio apartments for rent, 1-bedroom apartments for rent, 2-bedroom apartments for rent, or 3-bedroom apartment for rent.

These lakefront Hyde Park apartments are nestled among million-dollar estates and local hot spots such as public parks, museums, and more Nobel Prizes per square kilometer than any other neighborhood on Earth. Promontory Point is close by; it's a favored lookout point among bikers, joggers, not to mention a great place to have a picnic. Our apartments in Hyde Park are also near the Museum of Science and Industry where you can spend hours upon hours discovering things you never even knew you were missing out on.

Regents Park is extremely close to a Metra train station and a CTA bus stop. Walk to downtown Hyde Park for popular restaurants, Harper Court, the Hyde Park Farmers Market, and lots of eclectic shopping. 

Regents Park apartments in Hyde Park is sure to have an apartment home that meets your needs. Check out our variety of floorplans including 1 bedroom apartments for rent, 2 bedroom apartments for rent, and 3 bedroom apartments for rent. We hope to welcome you to our ever-growing neighborhood soon! Regents Park is an apartment community located in Cook County and the 60615 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Chicago Public Schools attendance zone. Unique Features

Welcome Home to The Maynard at 5115 N Sheridan, Chicago's beautifully upgraded apartment community, where you can enjoy the best of everything Uptown and Edgewater have to offer.  Our newly renovated Edgewater apartments in Chicago feature new cabinets, sleek stainless steel appliances, and stylish fixtures on a fashionably understated background. We use the latest decorating trends to produce clean lines with sophisticated palettes and rich finishes that accent the unique design features of our sizable studio and one-bedroom apartments.

At The Maynard at 5115 North Sheridan, your comfort is our priority. All our residents have access to our newly renovated private parking area, state-of-the-art fitness center, and luxuriously appointed clubhouse complete with a working fireplace. Take your furry friend on a stroll through the gorgeous Uptown neighborhoods and be sure to take advantage of our in-house dog wash to keep your pup looking sharp and smelling fresh. 

Just moments from historic Edgewater, your apartment at The Maynard at 5115 North Sheridan is within walking distance of a variety of local restaurants, transportation, boutique shops, and gorgeous beachside parks and gardens. Whether you are enjoying a night on the town or a relaxing day in your cozy apartment, you'll never lack for comfort and luxury at The Maynard at 5115 North Sheridan.

about.description:
Lake Meadows is a premier residential community located in the heart of the historic Bronzeville neighborhood, just south of downtown Chicago. Spread over 70 acres of open space and mature trees, Lake Meadows offers a peaceful and comfortable living environment for residents. Studios, 1-Bedroom, 2-Bedroom, and 3-Bedroom floorplans can be found within the four high-rise residential buildings and five mid-rise residential buildings. 

Our community is located just a short walk away from both Illinois Tech and Lake Michigan's 33rd Street beach. Public transportation options like Chicago's public bus, "L" and Metra stops are easily accessible, making commuting a breeze for residents without a car. For those with a car, fast access to the Dan Ryan, Eisenhower, and Lake Shore Drive expressways is available.

Just a few steps away from your home is the Lake Meadows Shopping Center, which includes a supermarket, restaurants, and retail stores. about.description: Chicagos best neighborhood just got better. Welcome to ELEVATE Lincoln Park - a brand-new, elegantly designed, luxury apartment building located on a tree-lined street, 1.5 blocks from the Fullerton L station in the epicenter of Lincoln Park.From the exclusive one and two-level penthouses to the spacious studio, one, two and three bedroom apartment homes, ELEVATE Lincoln Park has a floor plan to accommodate every lifestyle. Escape the rush of the city 11 stories above Lincoln Park from a poolside cabana with spectacular Chicago skyline views. Entertain friends in our state-of-the-art demonstration kitchen or relaxing private courtyard. Nurture your body and soul in our 24-hour fitness center or private yoga studio. Although you'll have the entire city at your doorstep, these features may tempt you to never leave home again. ELEVATE Lincoln Park raises the bar for luxury rental living with an experience that is second to none.If you have been searching for a sophisticated apartment building with full amenities including a 24-hour concierge and secured parking, your search is finally over. about.description: Luxe on Madison offers luxury living in the vibrant West Loop, one of Chicagos most sought-after neighborhoods. Positioned near major corporate headquarters like McDonald's, Google, Sprout Social, and Motorola, our pet-friendly apartments provide an ideal location for professionals. With the Blue and Green Line stations and the Madison & Racine bus stop just steps away, commuting and exploring the city is effortless.Choose from spacious studio, one-, and two-bedroom units featuring high-end finishes and boutique-style amenities that emphasize exceptional attention to detail and service. Luxe on Madison is a haven for food lovers, surrounded by some of Chicagos top dining spots, including Monteverde Restaurant & Pastificio and Ranallis West Loop. Immerse yourself in the local arts scene with the WNDR Museum, Chicago Children's Theatre, and The Art Institute of Chicago all within easy reach. about.description: Built in 1920, Del Prado was one of the largest of Hyde Park's fashionable apartment hotels and attracted famous visitors, including Amelia Earhart, Babe Ruth, Mickey Mantle, Yogi Berra, and Joe Dimaggio. With reverence for the original design and as well as an appreciation for contemporary lifestyles, Del Prado's 21st century renovation encompasses the complete restoration of the original architectural details as well as the addition of state-of-the art amenities including the fitness center, wireless internet, and a variety of elegant study areas and lounges. Re-designed units have modern open floor plans to maximize natural light and circulation, and feature high-end finishes such as maple cabinetry, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances. Building on its flavorful history, today's Del Prado uniquely combines rich layers of the past with the sleek sophistication of the present. The Del Prado is an apartment community located in Cook County and the 60615 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Chicago Public Schools attendance zone. Unique Features

about.description: Welcome to North Water Apartments, a luxury residential tower adjacent to Loews Chicago Hotel, in the heart of Chicago's premier Streeterville neighborhood. North Water features an elegant collection of amenities, including a Sky Deck with an outdoor terrace and stunning views of the iconic Navy Pier and Lake Michigan, a resident lounge, an outdoor pool, and a fitness center. Valuable conveniences include 24-hour concierge, resident events and fitness programming, on-site dry cleaning, covered garage parking, and an on-site pet spa. The perfect home for those who appreciate comfort-centric city living, North Water Apartments is a hidden gem that unlocks access to the best of Chicago's vibrant lifestyle. about.description:
4721-29 S. Ellis has 24/7 emergency maintenance service, a centralized resident services center, a resident app to request maintenance.  We offer Hyde Park studio apartments, and have 1 bedroom apartments for rent, and 2 bedroom apartments for rent as well. Street parking at these Hyde Park apartments is readily available as is exits from Interstate 90/94 and Lake Shore Drive highways are close.  

4721-29 S. Ellis apartments sit at the heart of a vibrant neighborhood as Hyde Park is full of museums, restaurants, bookstores, public parks, and even beaches.  For starters, Washington Park totals 366.84 acres and features two gyms, a photography lab, dance studio, racquetball court, fitness center, harvest garden, lagoon, aquatic center, and all sorts of sports fields. Also close by is Promontory Point, a favored lookout point among bikers, joggers, not to mention a great place to have a picnic! However, if sand is more your thing- 31st street's swimming beach is just a 6-minute drive from these Hyde Park rentals.  The CTA bus stop to the beach is on the block.

The center of dining in downtown Hyde Park is also close by where there are also several popular restaurants along 53rd and 57th Streets. If you are more into preparing your own meals, the Hyde Park Farmers Market, Whole Foods and Hyde Park Grocer are all a short walk from these Hyde Park apartments. 

Let a member of our friendly leasing staff know if you are interested in learning more about our 1 bedroom apartments for rent, 2 bedroom apartments for rent or Hyde Park studio apartments at the 4721-29 S. Ellis. 4721 S. Ellis Avenue is an apartment community located in Cook County and the 60615 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Chicago Public Schools attendance zone. Unique Features

about.description: Say hello to Fisher Building Apartments, a historic landmark located at 343 S. Dearborn Street in downtown Chicago, IL. As a renowned Chicago icon, this elegant building offers a diverse range of studio, convertible, 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments, along with exclusive 2-bedroom penthouses. Our residences feature historic hardwood flooring, granite countertops, and European-style cabinetry, with select units offering panoramic views of downtown Chicago and Lake Michigan. Residents enjoy a hotel-style lobby, a full-body fitness center, and a clubroom with billiards and entertainment space. On-site retailers include Brandos Speakeasy and 7-Eleven. Benefit from 24-hour concierge services, after hours emergency maintenance, and a business center. Our pet-friendly community also offers planned social activities, local discounts, and various lease term options. Contact us today to discover your new home at Fisher Building! Fisher Building Apartments is an apartment community located in Cook County and the 60604 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Chicago Public Schools attendance zone. Unique Features
